name: deep-sea-scale
effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Defense. Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.
short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Defense. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Gorebyss.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A scale that shines a faint pink, it raises the Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A scale that shines a faint pink, it raises the Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A scale that shines a faint pink, it raises the Sp. Def stat.
